statements: SELECT * FROM quiz_results LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_id, score FROM quiz_results WHERE quiz_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM quiz_results ORDER BY date_taken DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, score FROM quiz_results WHERE date_taken = '2022-01-15';
SELECT MAX(score) AS max_score FROM quiz_results;
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, score, date_taken FROM quiz_results WHERE score > 80 ORDER BY date_taken DESC, student_id ASC
SELECT student_id, MAX(score) AS max_score, MIN(score) AS min_score FROM quiz_results GROUP BY student_id HAVING MAX(score) - MIN(score) >= 20
SELECT student_id, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM quiz_results GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY average_score DESC
SELECT student_id, COUNT(quiz_id) AS quiz_count FROM quiz_results GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY quiz_count DESC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) AS unique_students FROM quiz_results
SELECT * FROM StudentResults WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, exam_score FROM StudentResults ORDER BY exam_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM LearningRecommendations WHERE student_id = 2;
SELECT student_id, recommendation_text FROM LearningRecommendations ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT student_id, quiz_score, exam_score FROM StudentResults WHERE quiz_score > 70 AND exam_score < 80;
SELECT * FROM StudentResults WHERE quiz_score > 80 AND exam_score > 80;
SELECT student_id, exam_score, quiz_score FROM StudentResults ORDER BY exam_score DESC, quiz_score ASC;
SELECT student_id, quiz_score, exam_score FROM StudentResults WHERE exam_score < 50 OR quiz_score < 50 ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM LearningRecommendations WHERE recommendation_text LIKE '%improve%';
SELECT student_id, quiz_score, exam_score FROM StudentResults WHERE quiz_score > 70 ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM quiz_results ORDER BY date_completed DESC;
SELECT student_id, score FROM exam_results WHERE result = 'Pass';
SELECT quiz_id, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM quiz_results GROUP BY quiz_id;
SELECT student_id, recommendation_text FROM learning_recommendations WHERE DATE(date_created) = CURDATE();
SELECT * FROM exam_results WHERE exam_id IN (SELECT exam_id FROM exam_results WHERE total_marks > 80);
SELECT * FROM quiz_results WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, score FROM quiz_results WHERE score > 80 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM exam_results WHERE exam_id = '987e6543-abcd-12ef-8765-098765432101' AND total_marks BETWEEN 70 AND 90;
SELECT student_id, result FROM exam_results WHERE date_completed >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_completed DESC;
SELECT recommendation_text FROM learning_recommendations WHERE student_id = '789abcd-1234-5678-90ef-abcdef123456';
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, score FROM QuizResults WHERE score > 80;
SELECT student_id, exam_id, exam_date FROM ExamResults WHERE exam_id = 123;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM Students WHERE enrollment_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, recommendation_text FROM LearningRecommendations ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, score FROM QuizResults WHERE score > 80 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM ExamResults WHERE exam_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND score < 70;
SELECT student_name, quiz_date FROM Students JOIN QuizResults ON Students.student_id = QuizResults.student_id WHERE quiz_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY quiz_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, recommendation_text FROM LearningRecommendations WHERE LENGTH(recommendation_text) > 50;
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, score FROM quiz_results WHERE score > 80;
SELECT student_name, student_age, student_grade FROM student_info WHERE student_age < 18;
SELECT exam_id, student_id, score FROM exam_results WHERE exam_id = 101 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT quiz_id, question_id FROM quiz_questions WHERE question_id < 5;
SELECT student_name, exam_id, score FROM exam_results, student_info WHERE exam_results.student_id = student_info.student_id AND score IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM student_info WHERE student_grade = 'A'
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM student_info ORDER BY student_age DESC

SELECT student_info.student_name, quiz_results.score, exam_results.score FROM student_info LEFT JOIN quiz_results ON student_info.student_id = quiz_results.student_id LEFT JOIN exam_results ON student_info.student_id = exam_results.student_id WHERE quiz_results.score > 80 AND exam_results.score > 70

SELECT student_info.student_name, quiz_results.score, exam_results.score FROM student_info LEFT JOIN quiz_results ON student_info.student_id = quiz_results.student_id LEFT JOIN exam_results ON student_info.student_id = exam_results.student_id WHERE quiz_results.score < 50 OR exam_results.score IS NULL

SELECT student_info.student_name, COUNT(quiz_results.student_id) AS quiz_count, COUNT(exam_results.student_id) AS exam_count FROM student_info LEFT JOIN quiz_results ON student_info.student_id = quiz_results.student_id LEFT JOIN exam_results ON student_info.student_id = exam_results.student_id GROUP BY student_info.student_name HAVING quiz_count >= 2 AND exam_count >= 1
